price: 103. Dadka badankiisuna ma rumeeyaan (Xaqa) si kastoo aad ugu dadaasho.
arabic: وَمَآ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَوۡ حَرَصۡتَ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā aktharu al-nāsi walaw ḥaraṣta bimu'minīna
